name: EVM Quirks Panel Discussion
description: Have you ever implemented (or tried) the EVM? Have you written a smart contract? You may be familiar with some unusual or weird quirks it has. This panel will explore some interesting ones and very likely share some personal stories and challenges faced by client and language developers.

speakers.name: Daniel Kirchner
speakers.bio: Member of the Solidity Team since 2018; Lead of the Solidity Team since the end of 2022.

speakers.name: lightclient
speakers.bio: Member of the go-ethereum team. Maintains several specifications, including `ethereum/execution-apis`. Co-author of EIP-3074.

speakers.name: Ayman Bouchareb
speakers.bio: Ayman is a 24 years old software engineer from Morocco, joined Nethermind last year as part of the core team, and mostly focus on EVM related topics (since Ayman likes VMs), and now Ayman works on small EIPs that touchs the EVM for Shanghai and Cancun forks as well as working on the full EOF update for the EVM.
